title: Keycloak 18.0.1 released
content: To download the release go to .   MIGRATION FROM 17.0  Before you upgrade remember to backup your database. If you are not on the previous release refer to for a complete list of migration changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   NEW FEATURES   * Admin Client for Jakarta EE keycloak   ENHANCEMENTS   * Add `majorMinorVersion` to global asciidoc context keycloak-web  * Upgrade to WildFly 26.1.1 keycloak  * Allow setting the admin hostname keycloak dist/quarkus  * Provide a separate guide for configuring the server truststore keycloak    dist/quarkus   BUGS   * v17/Quarkus Charset issue with LinkedIn IdP keycloak dist/quarkus  * Theme resources are not loaded correctlyusing quarking when having multiple    providers keycloak dist/quarkus  * Keycloak is ignoring custom infinispan config keycloak docs  * Wrong encoding used for container keycloak dist/quarkus  * Admin Console not showing under circumstances keycloak dist/quarkus  * Invalid link to using a reverse proxy in hostname guide keycloak docs  * Unable to provide own JGROUPS config stack. keycloak dist/quarkus  * Keycloak v18.0.0 fails to import realm when directories are present in    data/import location keycloak  * Frontend url from wrong realm used in password update mails from admin panel    keycloak dist/quarkus  * RealmRepresentation API link in operator guide leads to 404 + api is not    using same version as all other places. keycloak docs  * Make sure Operator correctly correctly configures proxy and HTTP hostname    keycloak operator  * Avoiding unnecessary roundtrips to the database when evaluating permissions    keycloak authorization-services  * Keycloak server fails to start when using different named schema keycloak    dist/quarkus  * Ingress creation loop keycloak operator   UPGRADING  Before you upgrade remember to backup your database and check the for anything that may have changed.
